commit.message:
utils.c (gnat_type_for_size): Set TYPE_ARTIFICIAL on created types.

2017-04-27  Pierre-Marie de Rodat  <derodat@adacore.com>

	* gcc-interface/utils.c (gnat_type_for_size): Set
	TYPE_ARTIFICIAL on created types.

From-SVN: r247303
